
``` java

CREATE TABLE "Innings" (
  "innings_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "match_id" int NOT NULL,
  "team_id" int NOT NULL,
  "innings_number" int NOT NULL,
  "total_runs" int DEFAULT 0,
  "total_wickets" int DEFAULT 0,
  "total_overs" decimal(4,1),
  "extras_total" int DEFAULT 0,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "Over" (
  "over_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "innings_id" int NOT NULL,
  "over_number" int NOT NULL,
  "bowler_player_id" int NOT NULL,
  "total_runs" int DEFAULT 0,
  "total_wickets" int DEFAULT 0,
  "extras" int DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE "Delivery" (
  "delivery_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "over_id" int NOT NULL,
  "delivery_number" int NOT NULL,
  "batter_player_id" int NOT NULL,
  "bowler_player_id" int NOT NULL,
  "non_striker_player_id" int NOT NULL,
  "runs_batter" int DEFAULT 0,
  "runs_extras" int DEFAULT 0,
  "runs_total" int DEFAULT 0,
  "extras_type" varchar(20),
  "extras_value" int DEFAULT 0,
  "is_wicket" boolean DEFAULT false,
  "wicket_type" varchar(30),
  "wicket_player_out_id" int,
  "review_requested_by" varchar(50),
  "review_umpire" varchar(100),
  "review_decision" varchar(50),
  "review_type" varchar(50),
  "is_umpires_call" boolean DEFAULT false,
  "fielder_player_id" int
);

CREATE TABLE "Powerplay" (
  "powerplay_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "innings_id" int NOT NULL,
  "powerplay_type" varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  "start_over" decimal(4,1) NOT NULL,
  "end_over" decimal(4,1) NOT NULL,
  "total_runs" int DEFAULT 0,
  "total_wickets" int DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE "InningsTarget" (
  "target_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "innings_id" int NOT NULL,
  "target_runs" int NOT NULL,
  "target_overs" int NOT NULL,
  "is_achieved" boolean DEFAULT false
);

CREATE TABLE "BattingScorecard" (
  "batting_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "innings_id" int NOT NULL,
  "player_id" int NOT NULL,
  "batting_position" int NOT NULL,
  "runs_scored" int DEFAULT 0,
  "balls_faced" int DEFAULT 0,
  "fours" int DEFAULT 0,
  "sixes" int DEFAULT 0,
  "strike_rate" decimal(5,2),
  "is_out" boolean DEFAULT false,
  "dismissal_type" varchar(30),
  "bowler_player_id" int,
  "fielder_player_id" int,
  "minutes_played" int,
  "partnership_runs" int DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE "BowlingScorecard" (
  "bowling_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "innings_id" int NOT NULL,
  "player_id" int NOT NULL,
  "overs_bowled" decimal(4,1) DEFAULT 0,
  "maidens" int DEFAULT 0,
  "runs_conceded" int DEFAULT 0,
  "wickets" int DEFAULT 0,
  "wides" int DEFAULT 0,
  "no_balls" int DEFAULT 0,
  "economy_rate" decimal(5,2),
  "dot_balls" int DEFAULT 0,
  "fours_conceded" int DEFAULT 0,
  "sixes_conceded" int DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE "ExtrasBreakdown" (
  "extras_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "innings_id" int NOT NULL,
  "wides" int DEFAULT 0,
  "no_balls" int DEFAULT 0,
  "byes" int DEFAULT 0,
  "leg_byes" int DEFAULT 0,
  "penalties" int DEFAULT 0,
  "total_extras" int DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "Innings" ("match_id", "innings_number");

CREATE INDEX ON "Innings" ("match_id");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "Over" ("innings_id", "over_number");

CREATE INDEX ON "Over" ("innings_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "Delivery" ("over_id", "delivery_number");

CREATE INDEX ON "Delivery" ("over_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "Delivery" ("batter_player_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "Delivery" ("bowler_player_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "Powerplay" ("innings_id");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "InningsTarget" ("innings_id");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "BattingScorecard" ("innings_id", "player_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "BattingScorecard" ("innings_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "BattingScorecard" ("player_id");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "BowlingScorecard" ("innings_id", "player_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "BowlingScorecard" ("innings_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "BowlingScorecard" ("player_id");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "ExtrasBreakdown" ("innings_id");

ALTER TABLE "Over" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("innings_id") REFERENCES "Innings" ("innings_id");

ALTER TABLE "Delivery" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("over_id") REFERENCES "Over" ("over_id");

ALTER TABLE "Powerplay" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("innings_id") REFERENCES "Innings" ("innings_id");

ALTER TABLE "InningsTarget" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("innings_id") REFERENCES "Innings" ("innings_id");

ALTER TABLE "BattingScorecard" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("innings_id") REFERENCES "Innings" ("innings_id");

ALTER TABLE "BowlingScorecard" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("innings_id") REFERENCES "Innings" ("innings_id");

ALTER TABLE "ExtrasBreakdown" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("innings_id") REFERENCES "Innings" ("innings_id");

```
